description: A postcard helped researchers pinpoint the probable spot near the French village of Auvers-sur-Oise.
title: Van Gogh: Postcard helps experts 'find location of final masterpiece'
title_page: Van Gogh: Postcard helps experts 'find location of final masterpiece' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Van der Veen said: "The sunlight painted by Van Gogh indicates that the last brush strokes were painted towards the end of the afternoon, which provides more information about the course of this dramatic day ending in his suicide."
